Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I bought the game a few days ago after downloading the demo. Didn\'t play the demo that much cause I didn\'t have the patience for it!

I watched a few YouTube LPs of KSP by kurtjmac and started to regain interest! Also watching the LP from TheWinterOwl; I find myself watching the LP more than

actually playing the game myself (this is similar to Minecraft for me)

So yeah, a brief intro of how I got here etc.

Here\'s hoping I can get more than one rocket in orbit! (I only have one at the moment )

Welcome to KSP! I\'m sure you\'ll get there eventually All of us have trouble at first.

One tip, less is more! You\'d be suprised how small a rocket you can get into orbit. As a more practical note, stack no more then three fuel tanks atop a LFE-30, beyond that its really just added pointless weight, and maybe you won\'t even be able to take off.

Good luck!

PS Plaatinum, how come your name is spelled 'wrong' (if it is supposed to be Platinum) ?

Welcome to KSP! I\'m sure you\'ll get there eventually All of us have trouble at first.

One tip, less is more! You\'d be suprised how small a rocket you can get into orbit. As a more practical note, stack no more then three fuel tanks atop a LFE-30, beyond that its really just added pointless weight, and maybe you won\'t even be able to take off.

Good luck!

PS Plaatinum, how come your name is spelled 'wrong' (if it is supposed to be Platinum) ?

Yeah I\'ve noticed that as well, gonna\' start to hopefully move for Munar orbits soon as I get a few satellites up around Kerbal

I am shocked at how small this community is; for an alpha game it\'s pretty impressive if i\'m honest, I am very excited to see what the future holds for KSP! Imagine other moons/planets/solar systems.

I really wish this game would get more views, I don\'t know of any popular youtuber who has covered this apart from kurtjmac

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

PS Plaatinum, how come your name is spelled 'wrong' (if it is supposed to be Platinum) ?

@Bluejayek: I meant it to be that way.
